resources.string: FindMyPhoneRe
General Settings
Email Settings
Active
Check this to activate the service
Secret text
This is the text that you need to supply to remotely control this phone
Please enter secret text
Test
Click to do a dry-run without sending an SMS. Needs debugger connected
Report phone number
Send SMS after SIM changes to this number
Enter the number that should receive SMS
Play alert
Play alert sound on receipt of SMS
Email trigger
Check this to trigger on receipt of email in K9Mail
Email prefix
Email subject must begin with this text and contain the secret text to trigger
Please enter text that email subject must begin with
Gmail user
The Gmail user to send replies from
Please enter the full gmail user (i.e. foobar@gmail.com)
Gmail password
The password to you gmail account
Please enter the password to your gmail account
Send email on SMS
Let an SMS trigger an Email as well
Enter the email address to send to. Leave empty to deactivate
